yojitha nawa nithiya yatathe kuda ha madhyama parimana wyapara wala badu prathishathayada warthamanaye athi 12% sita 14% dakwa wadi we. 2006 deshiya aadayam panathin menma eeta kalin pawathi siyalu panath wisinda ema nithiya yatathe athi balathala kriyathmaka kirima deshiya aadayam departhamenthuwe thakserukaruwan nathnam sahakara komasaris warun wetha rujuwama pawara thibuni.

ithin ona kenekuta bili puja karanna ayithiyak thiyanawa.

thrikunamalaya, sampur pradeshaye dewana galanguru balagaraya idikirima sandaha me wana wita siyalu katayuthu yoda athi athara, memangin jathika widulibala paddhathiyata megawot 500 ka dharithawayak sambandha kirimata apekshithaya.norochchola lakwijaya widuli balagara wyapruthiya mangin ithamath keti kalayakin laba athi prathilabha rasaki.khanija thelwalata wada adu wiyadamak sahitha gal anguru handunwa dima palamuwannayi.me nisa wasarakata khanija thel yoda widuli balaya nipadawanawa nam, ee sandaha rupiyal miliyana 52,500 ka pamana wiyadamak darimata siduwe.
balannako the waththe lassana..mewa naththam mehata dumriya enneth na...
